attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You have created with your blatent disreguard for the voters
of this country, and with your refusal to dismiss the speaker, a position where the electorate will pay the Labour Party back when it comes to an  election. This is your last chance to do the right thing and save the Labour Party.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
